name: Helios Technologies, Inc.
description: Helios Technologies, Inc. is a global leader in the manufacture and distribution of highly engineered motion control and electronic control technologies. Founded in 1988 and headquartered in Sarasota, Florida, Helios serves a diverse range of industries including mobile equipment, industrial, and renewable energy sectors. The company offers an extensive portfolio of products, including hydraulic and electronic control systems, as well as integrated solutions that improve performance, efficiency, and safety in various applications. Helios has a strong focus on innovation, investing significantly in research and development to advance its technologies and meet the evolving needs of its customers. The company's commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has established it as a trusted partner in the global marketplace. Helios Technologies is also dedicated to sustainability, continuously working on solutions that reduce energy consumption and environmental impact. With a strategic approach to growth, including acquisitions and collaborations, Helios aims to expand its market presence and deliver value to its stakeholders.
